TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract RibbonComboBox implements class Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonComponent, class Microsoft.Office.Tools.Ribbon.RibbonControl, class System.ComponentModel.IComponent, class System.IDisposable

summary.span: 表示自定义功能区上的组合框。

span.span: Represents a combo box on a custom Ribbon.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 组合框显示一个用户, 其中包含文本输入字段和下拉菜单中的选项列表。A combo box presents a user with a text entry field and a list of choices in a drop-down menu. 您可以通过使用 对象的方法在运行时创建。You can create a at run time by using the method of the object. 可通过两种方法来访问 对象：There are two ways to access the object: - 通过使用 Ribbon 类的 `Factory` 属性。By using the `Factory` property of the Ribbon class. 可从 Ribbon 类中的代码使用此方法。Use this approach from code in your Ribbon class. - 通过使用 `Globals.Factory.GetRibbonFactory` 方法。By using the `Globals.Factory.GetRibbonFactory` method. 可从 Ribbon 类外的代码使用此方法。Use this approach from code outside your Ribbon class. 只有在功能区加载到 Office 应用程序中之前, 才能设置此类型的某些成员。Some members of this type can be set only before the Ribbon is loaded into the Office application. 有关设置这些属性的信息, 请参阅[功能区对象模型概述](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview)。For information about setting these properties, see [Ribbon Object Model Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview). [!INCLUDE[vsto_interface](~/includes/vsto-interface-md.md)] ## 用法Usage [!INCLUDE[vsto_net35mref](~/includes/vsto-net35mref-md.md)]

summary.span: 获取或设置显示在此 上的图像。

span.span: Gets or sets an image this is displayed on this .
The image that is displayed on this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建议的图像格式为 PNG, 因为 PNG 格式的图像通过其 alpha 通道支持透明度。The recommended image format is PNG, because images in the PNG format support transparency through their alpha channel. 属性标识控件显示的图像。The property identifies an image that is displayed by the control. 此属性可在设计时或运行时设置。This property can be set at design time or at run time. 如果在运行时更新此属性, 控件的外观将更新以反映更改。If you update this property at run time, the control's appearance is updated to reflect the change. 建议的图像格式为 PNG, 因为 PNG 格式的图像通过其 Alpha 通道支持透明度。The recommended image format is PNG, because images in the PNG format support transparency through their Alpha channel. 如果设置了 属性, 则将忽略和属性。 If the property is set, the and properties are ignored. 尽管属性比其他两个属性提供的控件更多, 但它可能会变慢, 因为每次更新控件时, 都会将 image 对象发送到 Office 应用程序。Although the property gives you more control than the other two properties do, it can be slower because the image object is sent to the Office application every time the control is updated. 属性`true`必须为, 控件才能显示图像。The property must be `true` for the control to display the image. 在设计时设置属性时, Visual Studio 会将属性自动设置为`true`。When you set the property at design time, Visual Studio automatically sets the property to `true`. 如果在运行时设置属性, 必须在代码中将属性设置为`true` 。If you set the property at run time, you must set the property to `true` in your code.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个名称，该名称可用于在 事件处理程序中标识控件图像。

span.span: Gets or sets the name that you can use in the event handler to identify an image for the control.

value.span: 一个字符串，可用于在 事件处理程序中标识控件图像。

span.span: A string that you can use in the event handler to identify an image for the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅在某些情况下, 才能在运行时设置此属性。This property can be set at run time only under certain conditions. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[功能区对象模型概述](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview)。For more information, see [Ribbon Object Model Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview). 有关设置此属性的信息, 请参阅[功能区对象模型概述](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview)。For information about setting this property, see [Ribbon Object Model Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview). 属性标识控件显示的图像。The property identifies an image that is displayed by the control. Office 应用程序仅从解决方案中检索一次此映像, 以提高性能。The Office application retrieves this image from your solution only once, to improve performance. 只能在设计时设置此属性, 因为该属性标识的图像将在事件中加载。This property can be set only at design time, because the image it identifies is loaded during the event. 当显示功能区时, 每个映像名称只引发一次。 is raised only once per image name, when the Ribbon is displayed. 之后, 不能使用此属性更改控制图像。After that, the control image cannot be changed by using this property. 若要加载图像, 请将代码添加到事件处理程序。To load the image, add code to the event handler. 检查的属性,并将对象的属性设置为要加载的图像。 Check the property of the and set the property of the object to the image that you want to load. 如果设置了属性或属性, 则忽略此属性。This property is ignored if either the property or the property is set. 与属性标识的图像相比, 属性所标识的映像的加载速度要快得多, 因为 Office 应用程序只会在首次显示功能区时从你的解决方案中检索该图像。Images identified by the property can be loaded slightly faster than images identified by the property, because the Office application retrieves the image from your solution only the first time the Ribbon is displayed. 属性`true`必须为, 控件才能显示图像。The property must be `true` for the control to display the image. 在设计时设置属性时, Visual Studio 会将属性自动设置为`true`。When you set the property at design time, Visual Studio automatically sets the property to `true`. 如果在运行时设置属性, 必须在代码中将属性设置为`true` 。If you set the property at run time, you must set the property to `true` in your code.

summary.span: 获取此 中项的集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of the items in this .

value.span: 此 中的 对象集合。

span.span: A collection of objects in this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以在设计时或运行时添加、删除或更新对象。You can add, remove, or update objects at design time or at run time.

summary.span: 在此 的下拉列表打开时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the drop-down list for this is opened.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在用户打开下拉列表之前, 添加到中的项在其下拉列表关闭后不会加载到 Office 应用程序中。Items added to a while its drop-down list is closed are not loaded into the Office application until the user opens the drop-down list. 在向用户显示此事件之前, 可以使用此事件来更新此项的列表。You can use this event to update the list of items in this before it is shown to the user.

summary.span: 获取或设置此 的键盘快捷键。

span.span: Gets or sets the keyboard shortcut for this .

value.span: 此 的当前键盘快捷键。

span.span: The current keyboard shortcut for this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks KeyTip 必须包含1至3个大写字符, 不能包含空格、制表符或换行符。A KeyTip must have from 1 to 3 uppercase characters, and must not contain spaces, tabs, or newline characters. Keytip 有时称为 "访问键" 或 "加速器", 用作激活控件的快捷键组合。KeyTips are sometimes known as access keys or accelerators and are used as shortcut key combinations that activate controls. 按 ALT 键时, 功能区上将显示键提示。KeyTips appear on the Ribbon when you press the ALT key. 如果 KeyTip 与内置控件或其他外接程序的 keytip 发生冲突, Microsoft Office 可能会自动分配不冲突的 KeyTip 值。If your KeyTip conflicts with KeyTips for built-in controls or from other add-ins, Microsoft Office might assign non-conflicting KeyTip values automatically. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[使用键盘处理功能区程序](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=93523)。For more information, see [Use the keyboard to work with Ribbon programs](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=93523).

summary.span: 获取或设置此 上显示的文本。

span.span: Gets or sets the text that appears on this .
The text that appears on this .

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示此 中每次允许输入的最大字符数。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates the maximum number of characters allowed per entry in this .

value.span: 一个整数值，该值指示此 中每次允许输入的最大字符数。

span.span: An integer value that indicates the maximum number of characters allowed per entry in this .

value.span: 值为 0 指示没有任何预定义限制。

span.span: A value of 0 indicates that there is no predefined limit.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅在某些情况下, 才能在运行时设置此属性。This property can be set at run time only under certain conditions. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[功能区对象模型概述](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview)。For more information, see [Ribbon Object Model Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview). 属性不指定输入字符串的显示量。The property does not specify how much of the input string is displayed. 若要更改显示限制, 请设置属性。To change the display limit, set the property.

summary.span: 如果要使用内置 Microsoft Office 图标，请获取或设置要在 上显示的图像。

span.span: Gets or sets the image to display on the , if you want to use a built-in Microsoft Office icon.

value.span: 作为此控件图标的内置 Microsoft Office 图标的 ID。

span.span: The ID of a built-in Microsoft Office icon that serves as the icon for this control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性标识控件显示的 Office 图标。The property identifies an Office icon that is displayed by the control. 属性值是标识`imageMso`所选图标的值的字符串。The property value is a string that identifies the `imageMso` value of the selected icon. 此属性可在设计时或运行时设置。This property can be set at design time or at run time. 如果在运行时更新此属性, 控件的外观将更新以反映更改。If you update this property at run time, the control's appearance is updated to reflect the change. 有关`imageMso`值的列表, 请参阅 Microsoft 下载中心页面[Office 2010 外接程序:图标库](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=220760)。For a list of `imageMso` values, see the Microsoft Download Center page [Office 2010 Add-In: Icons Gallery](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=220760). 如果设置了属性, 则忽略此属性。This property is ignored if the property is set. 由于图像缓存在 Office 应用程序中, 因此可以比属性标识的图像稍快地加载属性标识的图像。Images identified by the property can be loaded slightly faster than images identified by the property, because the images are cached in the Office application. 属性`true`必须为, 控件才能显示图像。The property must be `true` for the control to display the image. 在设计时设置属性时, Visual Studio 会将属性自动设置为`true`。When you set the property at design time, Visual Studio automatically sets the property to `true`. 如果在运行时设置属性, 必须在代码中将属性设置为`true` 。If you set the property at run time, you must set the property to `true` in your code. ## Examples 下面的示例将 Microsoft Office 筛选器图标分配给组合框。The following example assigns a Microsoft Office filter icon to a combo box. 若要运行此代码示例, 必须首先执行以下步骤:To run this code example, you must first perform the following steps: 1. 向 Office 项目添加 "**功能区 (可视化设计器)** " 项。Add a **Ribbon (Visual Designer)** item to an Office project. 2. 将组添加到自定义选项卡。Add a group to the custom tab. 3. 向组中添加组合框。Add a combo box to the group. [!code-csharp[Trin_Ribbon_ControlProperties#2](~/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_Ribbon_ControlProperties/CS/Ribbon1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Trin_Ribbon_ControlProperties#2](~/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_OfficeSP/Trin_Ribbon_ControlProperties/VB/Ribbon1.vb#2)]

summary.span: 获取或设置用户将指针移到 上方时显示的提示文本。

span.span: Gets or sets tip text that appears when the user moves the pointer over the .

value.span: 用户将指针移到控件上方时显示的文本。

span.span: The text that appears when the user moves the pointer over the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值的长度必须小于1024个字符。The value must be less than 1024 characters in length. 设置属性时 , 文本显示为的标题。 When the property is set, the text appears as the title of the .

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示与 关联的图像是否可见。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the image that is associated with the is visible.

value.span: 如果与控件关联的图像可见，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the image that is associated with the control is visible; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果在功能区设计器`true`中设置、或属性, 则此属性将自动设置为。This property is automatically set to `true` if you set the , , or property in the Ribbon Designer. 您可以将其设置`false`为, 以使与此控件关联的图像处于隐藏状态。You can set it to `false` to cause the image associated with this control to be hidden. 在运行 时设置、或属性不会更改属性的值。Setting the , , or property at run time does not change the value of the property. 此属性对快速访问工具栏上显示的此按钮的实例无效。This property has no effect for instances of this button that are displayed on the Quick Access Toolbar.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否为下拉菜单中的项显示图像。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether images are displayed for the items in the drop-down menu.

value.span: 如果显示图像，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the images are displayed; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅在某些情况下, 才能在运行时设置此属性。This property can be set at run time only under certain conditions. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[功能区对象模型概述](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview)。For more information, see [Ribbon Object Model Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview). 有关设置此属性的信息, 请参阅[功能区对象模型概述](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview)。For information about setting this property, see [Ribbon Object Model Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview).

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示此 的标签是否可见。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the label for this is visible.

value.span: 如果标签可见，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the label is visible; otherwise, .
The default is .

summary.span: 获取或设置一个字符串，该字符串确定 的大小。

span.span: Gets or sets a string that determines the size of the .

value.span: 一个字符串，其长度可确定此 的大小。

span.span: A string, the length of which determines the size of this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在功能区设计器中设置属性时, Microsoft Office 应用程序会尝试调整大小, 以使其足以显示整个字符串。When you set the property in the Ribbon Designer, the Microsoft Office application tries to size the so that it will be large enough to display the entire string. 尽管 Visual Studio 允许长度最多为1024个字符的字符串, 但实际上, 使用的字符串长度可能要短得多。Although Visual Studio allows a string of up to 1024 characters in length, in practice the usable string length might be much shorter. 仅在某些情况下, 才能在运行时设置此属性。This property can be set at run time only under certain conditions. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[功能区对象模型概述](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview)。For more information, see [Ribbon Object Model Overview](/visualstudio/vsto/ribbon-object-model-overview).

summary.span: 获取或设置用户将指针移到 上时显示的多行提示文本。

span.span: Gets or sets multiline tip text that appears when the user moves the pointer over the .

value.span: 包含多行提示文本的字符串。

span.span: A string that contains multiline tip text.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 字符串的长度必须小于1024个字符。The string must be less than 1024 characters in length. 显示在 " 文本" 下。The appears under text. 与不同的是 , 会在字符串中启用分行符。Unlike the , the enables line breaks in the string.

summary.span: 获取或设置在此 中显示的文本。

span.span: Gets or sets the text that appears in this .

value.span: 在此 中显示的文本。

span.span: The text that appears in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果以编程方式更改此属性, 则不会引发事件。If you change this property programmatically, the event is not raised.

summary.span: 在用户更改 中的文本时发生。

span.span: Occurs when a user changes the text in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当用户在更改文本后按 ENTER 键、在更改文本后用户将输入焦点移到另一个控件时, 或当用户在列表中选择的项不同于当前正在拆装的文本时,引发此事件。棋.The raises this event when a user presses the ENTER key after changing the text, when the user moves the input focus to another control after changing the text, or when the user selects an item in the list that is different from the text that is currently displayed. 通过将新值分配给属性来更改文本时不会引发此方法。It is not raised when the text is changed by assigning a new value to the property.
